name: Paradise Inc.
description: Paradise Inc. is a digital artwork composed by traditional pencil and ink lineworks created by Dolce Paganne. The OBJKT is the first piece of the triptych “Garden of Earthly Delights, Update V.2” and it is based on the contemporary reinterpretation of Hieronymus Bosch’s 16th century masterpiece “Garden of Earthly Delights”. The entire exhibition that the work takes part in was initially the master project of the artist and has been completed in two years and a half. She was visited several times during this period in her studio in Antwerp by a mysterious Renaissance age ghost who whispered to her how to update the Holy Garden into its contemporary state.  (Series: Brand New Temple, 2017, Size: 6000x6000 px, the OBJKT includes a unique (1/1) giclée print of 70x70 cm with an authenticity certificate on archival 300 gr Hahnemülle paper, signed by the artist)
